channel.title: Work in Progress and Pimps
channel.description: Pimp your latest creation or get help with your WIPs here.

item.title: Cat for ut3 part2
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hide)
item.dc:creator: Hide
item.content:encoded:
Marygold and Chiala.
For ut3, for compatibility of customisation, all of their markings are tiger.
I'm making Ghost and Darkness, now.

I want to make "1st person arms", but I don't have 3ds max.
(The time limit of the trial version already passed over.)
Would someone please give me "psk" file of "1st person arms" ?

item.title: TRON Legacy Project
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
At any given time I usually have 5 or 6 skinning projects, which I switch back and forth on when I'm working on them at all. One I've had on the back burner for a little over a year has been a TRON skin cuz there doesn't seem to be one currently. I've seen a bogus one done on an Unreal 1 model...but other than that, nada.



I am, of course, exlcuding the models & skins for the UT-Modded UTRON conversion. I have that and have...

TRON Legacy Project

item.title: Wireframe Skin Pack - UT2004
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jefe)
item.dc:creator: Jefe
item.content:encoded:
Wireframe Skin Pack
Current Version: 0.4 (2014-01-10)

Download:
http://www.vgmp3.org/DLs/UT2004/Wireframeskinpackv0dot4.zip
http://wickedhq.com/index.php?/files/file/261-wireframeskinpackv0dot4zip/

A set of wireframe skins for all the Epic Player models, including Skaarj and human skeletons. There are at least two default colors per model, with 4 team support for all.

This eventually became my...

Wireframe Skin Pack - UT2004

item.title: Eight Years Later... (Thread Necromancy of the Best Kind)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nalid)
item.dc:creator: Nalid
item.content:encoded:
So... somewhere in the range of 2002-2004 I created an Anubis concept that I tried to get made here. I couldn't model myself. A few people really gave if their best and it was highly appreciated. If you are really curious and want to see some retro work, click here for the original thread.

http://forums.beyondunreal.com/showthread.php?t=144727&page=9

So why am I posting about this now? In 2012? Because I eventually learned to model, and I never forgot that old model from the...

Eight Years Later... (Thread Necromancy of the Best Kind)

item.title: Composite Superman
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
If ever the early years of the comic industry made a godpowered/weirdo, it was this guy.



The Composite Superman. Never heard a good explanation for why he chose to look like that, cuz he did choose the look, but he basically has the powers of the Legion of SuperHeroes...

...also one of the oddest origin stories I've ever heard:

For the record:
http://dialbforblog.com/archives/174/

Figured I wasn't...

Composite Superman

item.title: War of Light
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
I edit existing skins, for the most part. Made a few of my own and, so far as i know, I'm the only person to skin the Sktrooper model available through Oldskool thanks to Usaar33.

Chris Ollis made a number of superhero themed skins but he didn't give them any team colors. I've gotten permission from him, admittedly after the fact, and have been skinning them like crazy the last several years.

This past week I completed Blue Lanterns, Sinestro Corps, & Red Lanterns:...

War of Light

item.content:encoded:
I thought I would make a new Samus thread. After all its getting close to the release. (yeah, I know I am slow). I have done alot with the model since its last appearance. Have to say I am quite proud of how it turned out. Take a look of my new Samus model.

(no alpha channel - these are not renders)

item.dc:creator: MacTom27
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone !

Even if I have not so much time for skinning ( I am working on the Gen Mo Kai bots)
Actually my boss said I can model everything I want ( to learn 3DS Max)
at the office.

So I have started this Robot model ( a Xan clone again)



I need help and opinion to animate him.
I think I can skin him but I need the path with UV map

I am still a...

My first model ( Xan clone...Again ?)

item.title: UT2k4 - Overlord (working title, WIP)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Unpunished)
item.dc:creator: Unpunished
item.content:encoded:
hey guys! this is my first attempt at completely reworking a skin using new materials. usually I just use the heal brush to fix stuff, but this time I'm trying something new. any feedback? I'm still working with ideas for the head. any suggestions would be greatly appreciated, and you will be credited in the readme. thanks guys!

still need to do the hands and boots. I get a lot of inspiration from slaughter's skins, as you can probably tell. haha....

UT2k4 - Overlord (working title, WIP)

item.title: Tehzlur [WIP]
item.author: invalid@example.com (OveRLord)
item.dc:creator: OveRLord
item.content:encoded:
after reading Maxx's latest tutorial on creating toons for the lazy. I got his message he was trying to tell me for a few days now...take your time and dont rush things.


this is V1 im still working on the face. when this character is done it will be a cybernetic gorge/sledge one of my earlier characters under MY °MD° skin pack.

feel free to tell me what i should change around...the caution shoulder pads is kind of...

Tehzlur [WIP]

item.title: Caleb WIP
item.author: invalid@example.com (Antigen)
item.dc:creator: Antigen
item.content:encoded: Hey, everybody. I just started a new character project for UT2K4 today. In this one I'm making the likeness of my a friend of mine. I've gotten the bulk of it roughed in quite nicely. I have a feeling this one's gonna go a lot more smoothly, especially in the texture mapping phase, since his clothed-ness will allow me to break up the UV's a lot more efficiently. I'm gonna go for a much more realistic look on this one as well.

item.title: Rave Girl WIP
item.author: invalid@example.com (Antigen)
item.dc:creator: Antigen
item.content:encoded: I found this cool picture on the internet and decided to make it into a playable character. This is my first character ever and it's almost done save for the facial texture, hands and a proper re binding. Images attached so tell me what ya think.

item.title: Renzien for 2k4 [first character model]
item.author: invalid@example.com (SolaceEternal)
item.dc:creator: SolaceEternal
item.content:encoded:
Hi! This is my first character model, and frankly I'm a little confused about something, but I'll get to that in a bit. It's almost done; hopefully it'll be done within a week or two as I've got about ten animations left to do and the rest is tweaking.

I've been working on this for more or less two months, on my days off and after work. Started in blender, moved to max.



As you can see, he has no arms, and...

Renzien for 2k4 [first character model]

item.title: Halo1 Helmet for the Master Chief mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (albatross)
item.dc:creator: albatross
item.content:encoded:
Before I say anything, let me just remind the community that the arms, legs, torso, etc. were not created by me they were made\ported by EVIL ENGINE. The only thing here that is mine is the helmet. That said, this is nearly done...I just have one small issue: It crashes the game when I try to load a match. as you can see, it works fine in the 'create a character' screen but other than that I get...

Halo1 Helmet for the Master Chief mod
